name: Portales Fatalis (Mobile)
description:
A fast-paced, endless, survival game created for the Weekly Game Jam 111: Portals.

Enter a portal on any side of the screen to enter that color's world.

Be careful where you exit!

Tag the enemies matching the world color.

Avoid the rest.

Swipe to move and tap to restart.

Good luck!

Music: https://www.bensound.com
Sounds: https://freesound.org/
